subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: It will cost fans up to $775 a seat to watch the men’s gold medal hockey game at the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver, British Columbia. Officials organizing the Games announced ticket prices yesterday, saying their goal is to make sure all people can enjoy some events. Still, in-demand events will be pricey.Men’s gold medal hockey tickets start at $350, and tickets for the opening and closing ceremonies will range from $175 to $1,100. Tickets for the opening ceremony at the 2008 Beijing Games range from $26 to $650, but are selling online at several times their face value. For other Vancouver events, 100,000 tickets will be priced at $25.
